source_objects.title: Personal Brand Building
source_objects.description: Learn best practices and advice on how to create a compelling personal brand.

items.title: Creating Your Own Blog or Website With Google's Blogger
items.headline: Everything you need to know about creating a functional website or blog freely with blogger and how to use it to earn
objectives_summary: At the end of this course, Student will be able to create a website or blog   using blogger platform, use the design features on the platform to create a   beautiful and professional blog or website.
In addition to the points mentioned above, student will be able to do the following:
Create multiple pages on his website

items.headline: Learn how to take back control of your personal Google results
objectives_summary: You’ll go from being a bystander to someone who can take action
You’ll have the tools to protect yourself and others from misleading information or malicious online attacks.
You’ll know exactly how to remove or drown out the negative search results that appear on Google and replace them with positive ones.

items.title: Learning to Learn
items.headline: Towards Excellence as a habit.
objectives_summary: Excel through confidence and engagement with the kids with learning as a priority towards a win win attribute.

items.title: Practical Personal Brand For Self Employed & Sales People
items.headline: You've got a business. You're in sales. Now learn how to create referrals & introductions.
objectives_summary: Understand how Networking, Referrals & Personal Branding ACTUALLY work in the real world
Discover your current reputation / brand & how to enhance what’s working and stop what isn’t
Create a strong Personal Brand that is effective AND sustainable for years to come

items.title: How women can build a strong personal brand as professionals
items.headline: The ultimate personal branding course for professional women to help ensure your talent isn't overlooked.
